TopicTitle: Box Fins and Dynasaur inspired launch vehicles

Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I've been lurking since becoming obsessed with the game early last fall, and I think maybe I finally have something to contribute, so here it is.

I guess a lot of people have had issues building rockets for launching small space planes at the top, Dynasaur-style, and I seem to have come up with something that works: box fins.

As you probably know box fins are used IRL in situations where the object being "flown" is not aerodynamically enough shaped to fly in anything resembling a straight line. Those famous pictures of the fat-man bomb, or Zsar Bomba for that matter illustrate the concept. So I thought I'd try one out on my spaceplane launcher:

https://photos.app.goo.gl/GxU8T6x1JBNuXOdf1

 

The basic idea is to increase aerodynamic pressure at the bottom of the vehicle without necessarily increasing drag too much.

Best,

-mark

Greetings and welcome to the forum, @Mark Jerome Kerman.

Great looking design, mate and good idea.
